summary: Page 26 (book page 46/mem-vav). Covers continuation of section 88, then sections 89-95. All section numbers are correct and sequential. Right column first then left column is properly followed. Section 95 text continues to the next page.

issues.description: The meta says continues_to flag is false, but section 95 text ends mid-sentence with 'סגולה של ימי הסוכה וכו' and clearly continues to the next page (page 27 starts with continuation fragments from section 95). Should be continues_to: {flag: true, section_letter: 'צה', level: 'makor'}.
The text references 'קידושין לג:' but the standard reference for the sugya about mitzvot aseh shehazman grama is Kiddushin 34a (לד.). The same error appears in section 96 on the next page.
